body_html:
The workspace name mismatches are worrisome -- I'm not sure why you'd be getting those. Perhaps clear your bazel cache and make sure you don't have any hidden bazel config files or env variables that might be messing things up?

Can you please verify that you have

android_ndk_repository(
    name="androidndk",
    path="/home/sander/Android/android-ndk-r10e",
    api_level=21)

in your WORKSPACE file, and that
/home/sander/Android/android-ndk-r10e/toolchains/arm-linux-androideabi-4.9/prebuilt/linux-x86_64/bin/arm-linux-androideabi-gcc
exists?

What are the exact commands you use to clone and build?

body:
The workspace name mismatches are worrisome -- I'm not sure why you'd be getting those. Perhaps clear your bazel cache and make sure you don't have any hidden bazel config files or env variables that might be messing things up?

Can you please verify that you have 

```
android_ndk_repository(
    name="androidndk",
    path="/home/sander/Android/android-ndk-r10e",
    api_level=21)
```

in your WORKSPACE file, and that
`/home/sander/Android/android-ndk-r10e/toolchains/arm-linux-androideabi-4.9/prebuilt/linux-x86_64/bin/arm-linux-androideabi-gcc`
exists?

What are the exact commands you use to clone and build?
